summary.span: 类表示一个签名者，该签名者与表示 CMS/PKCS #7 消息的 对象相关联。

span.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所表示的签名类可以是通过消息内容或签名。The signatures represented by the class can be either over message content or a signature. 后一种签名称为*副署*。The latter kind of signature is referred to as a *countersignature*. 此实现的 CMS/PKCS #7 仅支持一个级别的副署。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. 也就是说，可以签名的签名，形成副署，但不能重新签署该副署。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. 此类没有公共构造函数;因此，它不能公开实例化。This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated. 它是只读的类可从访问属性。It is a read-only class accessible from the property.
